Installing and loading the package:

`devtools::install_github("saramortara/rspeciesLink")`

```{r setup}
#library(rspeciesLink)
devtools::load_all() # for development
```

```{r ex-01}
j_01 <- rjabot(filename = "jabot-01", 
               scientificName = "Prepusa montana") 
```
